artist: Delineator: Charles Eisen; Engraver: Étienne Ficquet
description: young man facing right looking out at viewer; long wavy hair; open neck shirt; cloak open; in an oval cartouche with drapery above and pedestal below; scenes from life of Christ at sides
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

below image in black: [ Eisen del.   Ficquet sculp/ JEAN/ VAN/ HOOGSTRAETEN]; on sheet in pencil: [1-560]
title: Portrait of Jean Van Hoogstraeten
